Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Operator', 3: 'Incoming! The next wave of beyond-visual-range strike will hit soon! Interception rate 73%!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Celica! Tell all departments to prepare for impact!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The alarm temporarily stops after a fierce collision.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The interception rate is dropping...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If this type of attack comes more often, Babylonia needs to increase the orbital height again... Which will make our communication to the ground even worse.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Celica, continue your loss report!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The door of the command room opens as a young man in senior lab uniform shows up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Based on our analysis of the observation results—ah, hey!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov, the Chief Tech Officer of the Babylonia Science Council, is pushed away by someone from behind.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Oy of the way!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Oh, Karen. Did something happen on your end?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I should be the one asking you that! Why is nothing happening here?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why's it still moving?! If this keeps going on—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Then we won\'t be able to use "that thing"!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Calm down. We tried everything we can, but none of our attacks could destroy the space station from outside...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The landing operation will start once Babylonia withstands this wave of attack.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It will be your time to shine once our ground forces find the enemy's weak point.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Wait a sec, why is someone like her operating "that thing"?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Cosmos Technician Union specifically asked Karen to do it because she's good at... creating explosions.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Such nonsense... All she needs to do is to press a button!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I thought humans had entered the automated era in the 21st century.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '"Press a button"? Do you know how difficult it is to control that thing?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'You know nothing! Want me to show you now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'S-speaking of! Gray Raven...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina puts her cannon down and turns to Celica.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hah! Right, where are the Gray Raven guys?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Swayed by Celica, Karenina is brought toward the main control room while Asimov straightens his shirt nonchalantly.'}
{3: 'Hassen pinches the bridge of his nose.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'As we all know, the space station has been broadcasting strong signal interference. The strength of interference varies periodically...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Our forecast shows the interference will soon be reduced to a historical low.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I know what you mean.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Hmph, that's right. I need you to allocate more manpower to escort a satellite to a position closer to the space station so we can study it better.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Alright, fine.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Don't worry, the findings will be worth it. After all...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm confident that this time I can find more truth about the Punishing Virus...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, we are 300km away from the space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'According to the mission brief, we will begin engaging Punishing-corrupted drones...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Pilot', 3: "Don't worry, we'll escort you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you very much.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I still don't like shuttles... This feeling of not being in control...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, how are you feeling?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm fine.", 3: '88', 4: "I don't feel too well...", 5: '93'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '"Fenrir" is a space-plane that can operate in both the atmosphere and space. It takes a high toll on the pilot\'s physical strength—usually, only Constructs can operate it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Even as a passenger, humans often feel sick. If there is anything wrong with your body...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Please, you must tell me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What's wrong? I've brought some serum and basic medical devices.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv does not perform the routine scan. Instead, she reaches over, as if she was trying to offer support.'}
{2: 'Yeah, what happened?!', 3: '102', 4: "I'm here.", 5: '102'}
{3: 'A nearby ally aircraft is shot and forced to retreat.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Pilot', 3: "Hold on! We'll buy you time!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The next few shells barely miss the wings of the shuttle and explode not far behind.'}
{3: 'A few Corrupted drones are already visible and are approaching at a high speed.'}
{3: 'Before engaging with Gray Raven, Corrupted drones are distracted by ally aircraft and a dogfight ensues.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Pilot', 3: 'Full speed ahead, Gray Raven! Break through, do not change your direction!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Pilot', 3: 'Your mission... is to land on the Corrupted space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the engine puts out more power, the shuttle quickly accelerates, leaving the explosions and signals far behind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory111.png'}
{3: 'Once the deceleration is over, the corrupted space station is mere inches away from you, completely obscuring your vision.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's huge... even though it's technically much smaller than Babylonia...", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's incredible.", 3: '131', 4: 'Any signals here?', 5: '133'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I can barely see any allies nearby... I'm not getting any signal either...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Perhaps it's due to the interference... I'm sure we aren't the first squad to arrive here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, bad news... We're being locked on by multiple weapon systems.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Tsh, it's the space station's short-range interceptors. No wonder there's no one staying in this space.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As he says it, multiple flares fly toward the lone ship you are on, their tails crossing and trailing one another.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Ugh! We're hit! Initiating emergency landing, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, the hull is breached! We'll be exposed to a vacuum shortly—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please activate your space combat outfit immediately!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With your outfit activated, your helmet veils your vision once more before the air pressure drops, inside it a slight overabundance of oxygen.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'You can no longer hear what Lucia is shouting at this point.'}
{3: 'An anxious Lucia gestures you to communicate with your Mind Beacon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Can you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I can hear you.', 3: '164', 4: "What's your situation?", 5: '166'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant's not injured, and the readings are fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We're approaching the surface! Prepare for a rough landing!", 4: '1'}
